kpi.name: M1022C224

kpi_info.title: CHANNEL SWITCH FROM SC-HSDPA TO DC-HSDPA SUCCESSFUL
kpi_info.use: The number of successful channel switches from single-carrier HSDPA to DC-HSDPA. The counter is updated independently of possible MIMO or DC-HSUPA usage. UPDATED: When the RNC receives RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION COMPLETE message from the UE after a successful channel switch from SC-HSDPA to DC-HSDPA.

kpi.kpi_alias: CHANNEL SWITCH FROM SC-HSDPA TO DC-HSDPA SUCCESSFUL
